I mean this isn’t even ntr like this it netori not netorare She’s the main character netorare is we’re the main character is the won cheated on not cheating Also the plot was retarded 2/10

Well, the BF said "Eh?? No that is...." it could be two things: either BF is lying and trying to cover it up OR it is a misunderstanding. Or perhaps a third option would be that the girl is a fucking delusional slut and wanted to fuck old men but made up a stupid excuse to have sex and blamed on BF for cheating.

ok i saw some other works of this artist and he writes a lot of ntr & in some of them the story is totally unreasonable
but his doujins give a very nice fap when it's ntr free or the ntr ain't that strong, i mean at least for me

@below: No, the old guy meant he haven't had sex for 7-8 years with anyone and the girl calls it "2nd V-card" for not having sex for so long. That sentence didn't imply at all that the old guy and this young girl previously had sex. Girl calls him lover cuz they are about to have sex. Yes she is seeking some sort of "revenge" on the BF based on the context since she thinks BF was cheating on her. TBH, this kind of revenge is fucking retarded. I mean OK so she is physically depraved by old men as "revenge" just to emotionally hurt the BF (and they aren't even married, these two are just two younglings having puppy love) like plsssss, is it worth it? ROFLMAO
wait when did the boyfriend cheat?

Honestly I really didn't understand if the girl is crazy or if the dude cheated on her and did it all for revenge. I mean in the start were pretty much told by the bystanders that the girl is a bit I don't know weird in the head or at least different/special. Then she starts calling the random homeless guy her lover and that they haven't had sex for 7-8 years and that the 2nd virginity was taken. Which just sounds weird since that would mean they had sex back when she was like 10-12? Then were not given any info on that the bf is actually cheating except she say's so and then she say's she loves him and this is revenge but she also wants to become dirty/soiled for him??? She also knows her bf loves her the most, then why is she saying he cheated on her? Then last pic is now that she's become soiled enough for him he should look at her? Or take her back???
damn it i thought it was all the h3 content got translated
there were other ways to get revenge on your boyfriend for cheating. But the way she did it, IDK
